key.name: mode-setting
key.description: 1 for Temporary Mode, 2 for Persistent Mode.

key.name: monitor-setting
key.description: Stores the connector name of the monitor chosen in the quick toggle (e.g. HDMI-1, DP-2).

key.name: debug-logging
key.description: When enabled, detailed structured logs are written to the journal for developer debugging. Use: gsettings set org.gnome.shell.extensions.dual-monitor-toggle debug-logging true
